biotools.summary:
Phylogeny-based Contamination Detection in Mitochondrial and Whole-Genome Sequencing Studies.

Haplocheck detects contamination in mtDNA AND WGS sequencing studies by analyzing only the mitchondrial DNA. You can use our cloud web service or install it locally.

bioschemas.name: haplocheck
